wordmark.alt: Symbol of the Government of Canada
landingPage.intro: Scams can happen to anyone. They’re not always easy to recognize and new ones are invented every day.
landingPage.required0: Before you start, gather what you can about the scam:
landingPage.required3: Details on where it came from
landingPage.summary: Your report helps the RCMP learn about these crimes and helps police across Canada catch cybercriminals.
landingPage.title: Report a scam
timeFramePage.intro: It’s okay if you don’t know exactly when it took place. You can give your best guess or leave this blank.
timeFramePage.title: When did the scam happen?
whatHappenedPage.details1: Think about including things such as:
whatHappenedPage.details2: Which app, website, or device you were using
whatHappenedPage.details4: What they promised, threatened, or stole
whatHappenedPage.hint: Tell us about it in your own words.
whatHappenedPage.intro1: What happened is not your fault. Scammers use a number of techniques to get what they want.
whatHappenedPage.title: Describe what happened
whatHappenedPage.intro: What happened is not your fault. Scammers use a number of techniques to get what they want.
scammerDetailsPage.details: Think about including things such as:
scammerDetailsPage.details1: Who the scammer claimed to be
scammerDetailsPage.details2: Where they asked you to send things
scammerDetailsPage.details3: What language they used to communicate
scammerDetailsPage.intro: Any clues about the source of the scam can help police track down the scammer.
scammerDetailsPage.hint: Remember to include any email addresses, phone numbers, or website links
scammerDetailsPage.summary: What do you know about where the scam came from?
scammerDetailsPage.title: Add suspect clues
impactPage.detail: What was the impact of the scam?
impactPage.example: For example: the amount of money, the information taken, what else was affected
impactPage.intro: You're not the only one affected by this scam. Help protect others by telling us how the scam affected you.
impactPage.summary: Tell us more about how it impacted you.
impactPage.title: Impact caused by the scam
contactInfoPage.intro: We will use this to send you a confirmation email and to link your report to other reports in your area.
contactInfoPage.title: Leave your contact information
